meanings.sent1: The malcontented student complained about the boring lesson.
meanings.sent2: She felt malcontented with the slow progress of the project.
meanings.sent3: The malcontented cat refused to eat the same food every day.
meanings.sent4: The malcontented clouds darkened the sky, hinting at an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: His malcontented expression spoke volumes about his unhappiness.

meanings.definition: A person who is dissatisfied and rebellious
meanings.sent1: The malcontented in the group always stirred up trouble.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled a malcontented for constantly challenging authority.
meanings.sent3: The malcontented at the meeting kept interrupting with complaints.
meanings.sent4: The malcontented was like a thorn in the side of the organization.
meanings.sent5: The malcontented's constant protests made him a familiar face at rallies.
